item.title: How I just customised my featured link thumbnail
item.description: I had spent a few days building a demonstration of what I am capable of using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. The next step was to show it off! So after hosting it using GitHub pages it was time to share it around in as many places as possible in the hope of it being noticed. But there was one problem… when I shared it on my LinkedIn profile, front and centre in the “Featured” section, the thumbnail was a bland and generic grey rectangle.
